body.description: L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Nourishing Conditioner hydrates, conditions and keeps color treated hair shiny and beyond brilliant. Anti-Oxidant [UV] system protects hair color and shields color from fading. For best results and amazing shine, use L'Oreal Color Vibrancy shampoo and conditioner together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ELVIVE COLOR VIBRANCY COLOR VIBRANCY & SHINE FOR UP TO 8 WEEKS* L’Oreal Paris Elvive Color Vibrancy system of shampoo and conditioner features Linseed Elixir and Anti-Oxidants [UV] delivering color protection and high-shine for up to 8 weeks*. This anti-fade range instantly nourishes hair and offers a sophisticated scent with a floral, creamy blend. *with system

EXPERT PROTECTING FORMULA THE SCIENCE OF COLORED HAIR Color-processing can make the hair fiber porous and fragile. Color fades and loses vibrancy. Chemically treated hair needs to be nourished and protected. Our expert protecting formula features Linseed Elixir and Anti-Oxidants [UV] for proven results.

Next page 1 Caring Formula 2 Color Protecting System 3 Sustainable Packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best conditioner and shampoo !
reviews.reviewText: The best conditioner and shampoo for colored hair it’s very affordable and it makes my hair soft and bright ! It’s be tried so many expensive shampoos and conditioners but this one hands out the best ! My mom uses the same one for her blond hair and she loves it too !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, lightweight conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Feels amazing on color treated hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair soft and helps protect color
reviews.reviewText: I bleach my new growth and color treat my hair on a regular basis. Before using this conditioner my hair was dry and had some breakage. After routinely using this conditioner along with treatments for damage control my hair is soft and shiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Personally, this leaves a bit of a residue in my hair despite much rinsing. It does moisturize as it claims to, but a bit at the sacrifice of feeling clean. I am not a huge fan of the pump, it is a little cumbersome to use (feel like it fights me a bit). Additionally, after several pumps it sucks in the the sides of the container, creating a need to unscrew the pump for it to reinflate itself (so as not to cause some horrific conditioner implosion mid-shower). Otherwise the scent is nice, the price was very right (at the time it was like $8 for 28 lf oz). Very upset with shrinkflation prices so the more i can get for less, the better. Just wish this conditioner jibed with my hair better. I'll still use the whole container down to the last drop... maybe my hair will be that much less damaged and better for it, who knows? Just gonna have to put up with some light residue for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hair
reviews.reviewText: My hair has never felt so soft. I color my hair monthly and it does a great job of keeping my hair healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a relatively inexpensive conditioner, this is amazingly good. I usually use Purology Nanoworks shampoo/conditioner, but found the last batch of conditioner to be too oily for me. L’Oreal Elvive keeps my color and smells great. Even my salon stylist approves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Love this L'Oreal conditioner. Have been using it for several years - leaves my hair soft while preserving the color. Great value for this size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years and won’t buy anything else. I love it.
